loans.name: Anafelia

texts.en:
Anafelia is 38 years old and residing at Datu Tangkilan, Sindangan, Philippines. She is married and blessed with four children who are all of school age.

She joined PMPC on May 17, 2009, in order to access the programs and services of the said co-op. Recently, she's accessed her 14th loan in the amount of 50,000 PHP for additional working capital for her existing business to purchase additional grocery items for her store. 

Anafelia hopes and prays that her business will grow to sufficiently provide her family. In the future, she wishes to see all her children holding their diplomas and getting stable jobs.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items for her store

loans.name: Hj. Sarmanah

texts.en:
This is Hj. Sarmanah, 52 years old and a single parent. She lives with her children. She has five children. She is usually selling food and cake. She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 5,000,000 rupiah (IDR). This loan will be used to buy and build a water source at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family. She wants to have access to safe sanitation for families. Her family's income is still not enough to build toilets and water resources by cash, but they are able to repay loans received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all of the lenders.

loans.use: to buy and build a water source at her home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family

loans.name: Mourine's Group

texts.en:
Mourine is the group leader of her group in Kakamega South District, and she is representing nine farmers, including herself. She is married and a proud mother of four children. Mourine joined One Acre Fund for the first time this season, but she has been a farmer for 13 years.

Like many other farmers, Mourine decided to work with One Acre Fund in order to earn enough to send her children to school. She hopes that by joining One Acre Fund and using the seeds and fertilizer she will get with this loan she can join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers that have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program. She plans to use the profits she earns from this year’s harvest to send her children to school.

Mourine's Group will use the farming inputs received with this loan to cultivate a total of five acres of land. They will also receive a total of one solar light, as, even though Mourine decided not to, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation

loans.name: Gleirden Milena

texts.es: Gleirden una mujer joven, llena de ánimos, responsable, amoroso y muy honrada, propietaria de una pequeño taller de confección donde siempre se había hecho confección a terceros, emplea tres personas y ahora se le presenta una gran oportunidad la cual es tener su propia línea de confección, pero para ello necesita cierta maquinaria que en el momento no tiene el capital para comprarla por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de una mesa de corte que es la puntada final que necesita para poder tener en su taller todas las herramientas para iniciar su propia línea de ropa aspirando a mejorar su calidad de vida y en futuro no muy lejano comprar una casa propia.
texts.en: Gleirden is a young woman full of energy, loving, and very honest, the owner of a small sewing shop where she always has been sewing for third parties. She employs three people and now a great opportunity has presented itself, which is to have her own sewing line. But, for that she needs certain machinery for which, at the moment, she doesn't have the capital to purchase. So, she asks for a loan to purchase a cutting table which is the final stitch that she needs to be able to have in her shop all the tools to start her own line of clothing. She aspires to improve her quality of life and in the not-so-distant future purchase her own house.

loans.use: to purchase a cutting table.

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
La creatividad de un empresario no tiene límites, esa capacidad de crear empresa en condiciones adversas y es que estar sin empleo con la esposa en embarazo y sin dinero es complicado, pero gracias a la corporación interactuar Javier puede gozar de un empleo el Cual es alquiler de lavadoras, una actividad muy famosa e sectores pobres que de verdad no tienen la capacidad de adquirí este producto y lo que hace Javier es darles esa posibilidad por un bajo precio.
Javier ahora es el orgullo padre de 2 hijos y ahora solicita un crédito para comprar dos lavadoras y ampliar su almacén por que no les caven las lavadoras.
texts.en:
The creativity of an entrepreneur doesn't have limits, this capacity to create business in adverse conditions, being without employment and having a pregnant wife and no money is complicated. But, thanks to the Corporación Interactuar, Javier can enjoy employment, which is renting washing machines, a very well-known job in poor areas that really don't have the capacity to get this product and what Javier does is give them this possibility for a low price.

Javier now is the proud father of two children and now asks for a loan to purchase two washing machines and expand his shop because the machines don't fit.

loans.use: to purchase two washing machines and expand his shop.

loans.name: Esteban David

texts.es: Davis es un joven humilde y muy trabajador, tiene 19 años de edad, el trabaja de mesero en un patio de comidas y adicionalmente a este negocio se dedica a  la comercialización de ropa, David vive con sus padres y con un hermano con  el que se dedican a la venta de ropa y zapatos, el crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de ropa para aumentar sus ingresos y asi seguir formando un capital y mas adelante ponerse un local de ropa.
texts.en: David is a humble and very hard-working young man. He is 19 years old, and works as a server in a food court, and in addition to this business he works selling clothing. David lives with his parents and with a brother, with whom he work selling clothing and shoes. He will invest the loan in the purchase of clothing to augment his income and in this way continue growing his capital and in the future establish a retail space of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Ep Maman Mwilu Group

texts.fr: La cliente MAKINDU est présidente du groupe EP MAMAN MWILU. Agée de 51 ans,elle est veuve avec 7 enfants tous étudiants.Elle a pris connaissance de l'existence du credit aux enseignant, c'est ainsi, qu'elle vient solliciter un prêt pour lui permettra de réfectionner sa maison.  Elle remercie HEKIMA pour le soutien qu’elle apporte aux enseignants qui sont coincés par un maigre salaire.
texts.en: Hekima client Makindu est the president of the group called EP MAMAN MWILU. At the age of 51, she is a widow with seven children, all enrolled in school. She found out about the existence of loans for teachers, and that is how she came to ask for a loan that would permit her to renovate her house. She thanks Hekima for the support it brings to those in the teaching profession who experience difficulty because of their meager salaries.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 26-year-old single man from Tulkarm city. He lives with his family in a small simple house. Two years ago, Khaled started working in transferring goods using his old vehicle. He takes different orders like transferring fruits and vegetables or furniture. It is a good business and provides him with a good income. 

Khaled took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new engine for his vehicle. By taking this loan, Khaled will be able to get back to work and pay part of the urgent expenses he has. 

Khaled appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for his vehicle.

loans.name: Reina Esperanza

texts.es:
Reina, ha mejorado su venta de comida, antojitos, pan y cultivo de granos básicos con la ayuda del préstamo anterior, comenta que tiene nuevos clientes, sus ingresos son estables y ha optimizado sus condiciones de vida familiar.
Está en la etapa de recolectar la cosecha de maíz y requiere de un nuevo crédito para pagar mozos que realicen las actividades agrícolas y comprar arroz, carnes, condimentos, verduras, bebidas, etc., para elaborar la comida, de esta manera seguirá mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
Reina has improved her sales of dishes, snacks, bread, and growing basic grains with the help of the previous loan. She says that she has new customers, her income is stable, and she has optimized her family living conditions. 

She is in the stage of harvesting the corn crop and needs another loan to pay the workers who do the agricultural work and to purchase rice, meat, seasonings, vegetables, drinks, etc. to make the food. In this way, she will continue improving her business.

loans.use: to pay the workers who do the agricultural work and to purchase rice, meat, seasonings, vegetables, drinks, etc. to make the food.

loans.name: Argelyn

texts.en:
Argelyn is 55 years old. She is married with six children and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Argelyn and her husband earn a living through farming. They mastered doing this type of activity as they got married, and supported her children's education and their family's needs. 

She joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative in February 2013. She is a hardworking mother who has strong determination to pursue her goals for the benefit of her family, alleviating poverty. Argelyn requested a loan to purchase fertilizer to have a high crop yield on her rice farm. This will help her farming income get a big boost. Someday, she hopes to buy land to expand her rice farming activities and venture into the rice selling business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to have a high crop yield on her rice farm

location.town: Sindangan-Lower Inuman, Sindangan, Zamboanga del N

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Victor de 31 años de edad estudió hasta 9° grado de educación básica, está acompañado y tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad que todavía no asiste a la escuela. Su pareja es ama de casa y comerciante, solo ella y su hijo dependen de él.

Victor es agricultor desde que tenía 15 años de edad, aprendió gracias a su padre que desde muy joven lo llevaba a trabajar al campo para que aprendiera y algún día pudiera mantener una familia con su trabajo. Para llegar al lugar donde trabaja camina 25 minutos a pie, y trabaja de 6:00 am 12:00 m y en este horario de trabajo su pareja se dedica a vender frutas en el mercado.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar una pareja de bueyes, con los que esperan sacar sus próximas cosechas y alquilarlos para sacar trabajos ajenos. Espera le resulte la inversión pues para bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Victor, 31 years old, went to school up to the 9th grade, is partnered, and has a 4-year-old son who doesn't go to school yet. His partner is a housewife and a businessperson. Only she and their son depend on him. 

Victor has been a farmer since he was 15 years old. He learned how, thanks to his father who since he was very young brought him to work in the fields so he would learn and one day could sustain a family with his work. To get to the place where he works, he walks 25 minutes, and works from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon and during this working schedule, his partner works selling fruit in the market. 

He asks for the loan to purchase a pair of oxen, with which he hopes to collect the next harvests and rent them out to get more distant work. He expects that the investment will have results for his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of oxen.

loans.name: Rosa Albina

texts.es:
Rosa de 52 años de edad estudió hasta 3er grado de educación básica, está casada y tiene 5 hijos de 30, 26, 22, 18 y 16 años de edad, dos estudian y tres son independientes y tienen su propio hogar, su esposo trabaja como jornalero, solo él y sus dos hijos viven con ella.

Rosa trabaja como empleada doméstica cuidado a una señora de edad avanzada, todos los días viaja desde su comunidad hasta el lugar de trabajo tomando un autobús a las 5:30 am para estar a las 6:00 am donde trabaja y sale a las 5:00 pm.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar 2 bolsas de cemento y dos fletes de madera, pliegos de lámina para hacer reparaciones en su vivienda y prepararla para la próxima época lluviosa. Espera mantener a sus hijos hasta que terminen sus estudios o decidan hacer su propia vida, mientras seguirá apoyando a su esposo con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Rosa, 52 years old, went to school up to the 3rd grade. She is married and has 5 children, ages 30, 26, 22, 18, and 16, two are students and three are independent and have their own homes. Her husband works as a day laborer and only he and their two children live with her. 

Rosa works as a domestic worker, caring for an elderly woman. Every day, she travels from her community to the place where she works, taking the bus at 5:30 am to get where she works at 6:00 am and leaves at 5:00 pm.

She asks for the loan to purchase 2 sacks of cement, 2 loads of wood, and laminate metal sheeting to make repairs to her house and prepare it for the upcoming rainy season. She hopes to support her children until they finish their studies or decide to make their own lives. In the meantime, she will continue supporting her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of cement and 2 loads of wood, and laminate metal sheeting.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de costura desde hace varios años ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza su trabajo, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de hilos, agujas, tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young man whose face has been pixelated because he is 26 years old and lives in a high risk zone, has had a sewing shop for some years, located in his home. He has many customers for the quality with which he does his work. The young man lives in his own house with his wife and two children. He is asking for a loan to purchase thread, needles, fabric, button, elastics, etc. and in this way be able to have more income.

loans.use: to purchase thread, needles, fabric, buttons, elastics, etc.

loans.name: Zulma Odilia

texts.es:
Zulma de 56 años de edad está casada y tiene 5 hijos, su esposo reside en el extranjero desde hace tres años, es conocida por ser trabajadora y emprendedora. Es comerciante y administra una tienda de productos varios, aprendió de su madre este oficio con quien trabajó y se lo heredó.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y pagar la mano de obra para construir un muro y una habitación en su casa, con ello espera mejorar la seguridad y comodidad con la que viven sus hijos. Espera contar siempre con el apoyo de la institución y le financie futuros proyectos.
texts.en:
Zulma, 56 years old, is married and has 5 children. Her husband has lived abroad for three years. She is known as a hard-worker and entrepreneur. She is a businesswoman and runs a store of a variety of products. She learned this work from her mother who did the work, and from whom she inherited it.

She asks for a loan to purchase construction materials and pay labor costs to build a wall and a room in her house. With this, she hopes to improve the security and comfort with which her children live. She hopes to always count on the support of the institution and that it finances future projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials and pay labor costs to build a wall and a room in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products for his store to resell.

loans.name: Kazim

texts.en:
Kazim is 60 years old, married, and has three kids. His wife is a farmer and raises seasonal vegetables and fruits. Kazim is a pensioner and his monthly income is 180 AZN. Unfortunately, this income isn't enough to cover his big family's demands.

Kazim's house was in bad condition and they have repaired it. Now he needs to repair old water pipes which were spoiled during the last serve winter. He needs to do tihs because, without water, his wife won't be able to raise fruits and vegetable and family's income will go down.

Kazim applied for a loan of 1200 AZN in order to buy high quality materials for new water pipes to be able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy high quality materials for new water pipes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for dental treatment and improvements - fillings, cleaning, etc.

loans.name: Ana Milena

texts.es: Milena  es una señora de nacionalidad colombiana, comenta que se vino a Ecuador junto a su esposos y a sus 3 hijos, su esposo en la actualidad trabaja en cultivo de flor en un empresa florícola y de sus hijos  2 están estudiando, Milena va a invertir el crédito en la compra de chanchos, Milena se dedica a la crianza de animales menores ya que comenta que es asi como le ayuda a su esposo en los gastos diarios y sobre todo para la educación  y alimentación de sus hijos de los que aspira que estudien hasta que se hagan profesionales.
texts.en: Milena is a Colombian woman who says that she came to Ecuador with her husband and their 3 children. Her husband currently works growing flowers in a  florist business and of their children, two are students. Milena is going to invest the loan in the purchase of pigs. Milena works raising small animals and says that this is how she helps her husband with the daily expenses and above all for the education and food for her children, who she hopes will study until they become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Sara Veraly

texts.es: Sara de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos,trabaja como empleada en una empresa privada, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo el baño y una pila en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena , lamina y pago de mano para que ella y su familia puedan vivir en lo limpio.
texts.en: Sara, 30 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their two children. She works as an employee in a private business. She wants to improve her house, building a bathroom and a pila [a large water basin] in the place shown in the photo. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase cement, bricks, sand, metal sheeting and pay labor costs so she and her family can live more cleanly.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, metal sheeting, and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Naira

texts.en:
Naira is 44 years old and lives in Stepanavan city of Lori region. Naira has a higher education and is an economist. For the past 15 years she has worked at the school in Stepanavan, where she is the accountant of the school. Naira’s husband works at the hospital, also as an accountant. They have two pretty daughters who are students at Yerevan State University; they rent a flat and live in the city. 

In addition to her work at the school, Naira also provides paid private courses of mathematics, preparing pupils for entrance examinations. Naira and her husband do their best in order to cover all the financial needs of their daughters. Both of them study at the paid divisions, and they also pay for their flat. Naira sometimes needs to work at home. She asks for this loan in order to buy a computer, which will help her to do the accounting work at home. She will also use part of the loan to buy some literature for her private courses.

loans.use: to buy a computer and literature for teaching private courses

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 62 years old, married to Eunice, and blessed with six children who are all adults. He has been in the farming business for the last 10 years and earns a monthly income of KES. 10,000 which he uses to support his family. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES. 7,000 from Vision Fund Kenya and intends to use the entire loan amount to buy energy-saving jiko for use in his family. Francis hopes to grow his farming business and be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy an energy-saving jiko (charcoal stove)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is 56 years old and he lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. He is married and is a father of three beautiful daughters, who are already married and live with their families.

Now Davit lives with his lovely wife. Together they enjoy their work on the land where they cultivate a great assortment of fruits and vegetables, including tomatoes, beans, potatoes, cabbages, and greens, as well as apples, pears, persimmons, mulberries, and nuts. Davit manages to sell a great part of the harvest that they gather from their land, some of it to resellers and some at the city wholesale market. Davit also does different construction jobs by order. Davit says that he is happy with his occupations that keep him and his wife active and also healthy. 

Davit’s land is very large and he needs this loan in order to repair the entire fence around it, since there are some parts where it is fully damaged and he will rebuild it.

loans.use: to repair the entire fence around his land, since there are some parts where it is fully damaged and he will rebuild it

loans.name: Emine

texts.en:
Emine is single and has two children. Three years ago she began making candies for weddings and memorial services, as well as door and wall decorations with a partner. She and her partner split up and now she opened a store doing the same work. 

Emine will use this loan to have a signboard made. With the rest, she will buy materials. Her dream is for her children to be educated.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Emine Hanım bekar ve iki çocuk annesi.  Üç yıldır bir arkadaşı ile ortak nikah şekeri,mevlüt şekeri,kapı ve duvar süsleri satan bir dükkan işletmişler.  Arkadaşı ayrılınca kendine yeni bir dükkan açarak işine devam ediyor.  Aldığı kredi ile tabela yaptıracak.  Geri kalanı ile malzeme alımı yapacak.  Hayali çocuklarını okutmak.

loans.use: to have a signboard made for her shop and to buy materials

loans.name: Ronald's Group

texts.en:
Ronald is a sixty-nine-year-old proud father of six children. He is a group leader, often described as a very hard working individual. He is representing his group of sixteen farmers in the Kakamega South District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Ronald has been able to consistently feed his family.

Ronald described his harvest as excellent last year but believes he can have an even better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have light during the night and have somewhere to charge his phone. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Ronald’s Group will be able to plant a total of 8.25 acres of land and purchase a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at her home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Josefa de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas desde hace 12 años, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo dos dormitorios en el lugar que muestra la fotogrfaia, por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su hija puedan vivir mas cómodas y seguras.
texts.en: Josefa, 61 years old, lives in her own house with her daughter. She has worked selling fruit for the past 12 years. She wants to improve her house, building two bedrooms in the place shown in the photograph. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, iron, and pay labor costs, so that she and her daughter can live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, iron, and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Sayuri Natali

texts.es: Sayuri tiene 23 años de edad y es una mujer increíble quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para ganarse la vida. Ella trabaja en una ferretería cercana a su localidad desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Sayuri desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales, dado que actualmente no cuenta con los servicios básicos como: agua potables y energía eléctrica,además, desea construir una pila para reguardar el agua. Por lo anterior  solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tubos, arena, ladrillo, cemento y pago de mano de obra para la instalación de la energía eléctrica y agua potable.
texts.en:
Sayuri is 23 years old.  She is an incredible woman who does everything in her capabilities to earn a living.  For quite a while now she has worked in a hardware store near her neighborhood.  This is how she takes care of the household finances, together with her partner.  

Sayuri wants to improve their living conditions since they don’t currently have utilities such as running water and electricity.  Additionally, she wants to build a basin to hold water.  Because of this, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of pipes, sand, bricks, and cement, and to pay for the labor to install electricity and running water.

loans.use: to buy pipes, sand, bricks, and cement to build a basin and pay for the labor to install electricity and running water.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es:
Guadalupe, se dedica a vender frutas, verdura y otros productos de uso doméstico que ofrece en una pequeña tienda instalada en su casa de habitación; es madre soltera, vive con su madre, su hijo y otros familiares, su mamá le enseño a realizar este negocio, posteriormente una de sus tías le cedió el puesto en el mercado,  es así como se decidió a instalar la venta de frutas y verduras, con el paso del tiempo ha incorporado otro tipo de producto, su negocio en el mercado está funcionando desde hace  3 años mientras que la tienda fue abierta hace 10 años.
El capital que solicita será utilizado para comprar bebidas, golosinas, productos desechables, granos básicos, frutas y verduras, mejorara el inventario de su negocio y sus clientes encontraran lo que están buscando para llevar acabo las festividades de fin de año, espera tener mejores ventas e ingresos que serán respaldo para el pago de su deuda.
Sus sueños son construir su casa propia, seguir apoyando a su familia y agregar mercadería nueva en su negocio.
texts.en:
Guadalupe works selling fruits, vegetables, and other household products which she sells in a small store located in a her house. She is a single mother, lives with her mother, her son, and other relatives. Her mother taught her how to do this work. Later, one of her aunts gave her a space in the market, and this is how she decided to establish the sale of fruits and vegetables. With the passing of time, she has incorporated other sorts of products. Her business in the market has been running for the past 3 years while the store has been open for 10 years. 

The loan that she requests will be used to purchase drinks, sweets, disposable products, basic grains, fruits and vegetables, to improve the inventory in her business and her customers will find what they are looking for to carry out the end-of-year festivals. She hopes to have better sales and income that will be backing to pay her debt.  

Her dreams are to build her own house, continue supporting her family, and add new merchandise in her business.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, sweets, disposable products, basic grains, fruits, and vegetables, to improve the inventory in her business.

loans.name: Goharik

texts.en:
This nice lady, with beautiful eyes, is Goharik. She lives in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. She has a vocational education, graduating from a trading college in her city. Now she works at the food market as a saleswoman. Goharik is married and has a daughter who is as pretty as she is. Her daughter is a student at the Yerevan State Agricultural Institute through the distance learning department. She will have a specialty of confectioner. Goharik says that her daughter likes sweets very much and dreams of making nice, tasty, and colorful sweets, which is why she chose this specialty. The only hardship is that she studies at the paid division. Since the family income is very low, the tuition fee is a serious problem for them.

This loan in an amount of 150,000 AMD will be used to pay for her daughter’s tuition fee for the first semester. She thanks Kiva lenders in advance.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter’s tuition fee for the first semester

loans.name: Jose Ricardo

texts.es: José de 23 años de edad es soltero y habita en vivienda propia junto a su abuela una mujer de la tercera edad que es su única compañía. Él es un joven trabajador que se gana la vida con su trabajo como jardinero en una residencial por lo que su trabajo es fijo, actividad que le permite salir adelante y apoyar a su abuela con los gastos económicos. José desea reparar el techo del corredor, ya que en este también se encuentra la cocina y el desea tener un lugar más adecuado para preparar sus alimentos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para reparar el techo del corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en: Jose is 23 years old and single. He lives in his own house with his grandmother, an elderly woman who is his only companion. Jose is a hardworking young man who works as a gardener in a residential complex. Thus, his work is permanent and enables him to get ahead and support his grandmother. Jose would like to repair the roof over the hallway, which is also the location of the kitchen, to have a more suitable place to prepare food. In order to do this, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails, and wire to repair the roof over the hallway of his house.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails, and wire to repair the roof over the hallway of his house.

loans.name: Bahar

texts.en:
Bahar is married with one child. She has a job, but also makes yogurt on the side. She learned how to make yogurt from her mother, and when her friends liked it she began making it as a job. Bahar has been making and selling yogurt for four years. She says she doesn’t get tired because she enjoys the work. This year Bahar has decided to start event planning, arranging weddings and birthday parties. She’ll use part of her loan for yogurt making ingredients and part to buy materials like tulle for her event planning business.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Bahar hanım evli ve bir çocuk annesi.  Bahar hanım bir iş yerinde çalışıyor ve aynı zamanda yoğurt yapıp satıyor.  Yoğurt yapmayı annesinden öğrenen Bahar Hanımın yoğurtları arkadaşları tarafından beğenilince bu işi ticarete dökmeyi düşünüyor.  Dört yıldır yoğurt mayalayıp satıyor.  Yoğurt yapma işinin çok zevkli olduğunu kendisini yormadığını anlatıyor.  İşten eve gidince sütünü kaynatıp yoğurdunu mayaladığını ertesi günde siparişini teslim ettiğini söylüyor. Bu sene organizasyon işine de girerek düğün ve doğum günü etkinliklerinin de  organizasyonunu yapmaya başlıyor.  Aldığı kredinin bir miktarı ile yoğurt mayalamak için güveç geri kalanı ile de organizasyonlarda kullanılmak üzere tül ve benzeri malzemeler alacak.

loans.use: to buy materials like tulle for her event planning business

loans.name: Marlon Ariel

texts.es: El joven Ariel tiene 26 años de edad, es de nacionalidad colombiana, comenta que se vino a ecuador junto a su hermano y que los 2 trabajan en una finca donde cuidan ganado y también se encargan del ordeño a las vacas, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de terneros que los va tener en terrenos de donde trabaja ya que comenta que ahí no le cobra de la hierba, Ariel aspira mejorar su negocio y de esta manera seguir trabajando y cubrir todos sus gastos diarios.
texts.en: Ariel is a 26 year old Colombian young man. He says that he came to Ecuador together with his brother, and the two of them work at a farm where they take care of cattle and also work milking cows. He will invest the loan in buying calves that he will keep where he works, since he comments they do not charge him for grazing land. Ariel wants to improve his business, and in this way to keep on working and to cover all his daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es una mujer con una mente muy positiva cada día, ella es casada tiene  41 años de edad,  vive junto a sus cuatro hijos en Nahuala Solola, ella siempre piensa en la superación de sus hijos y por tal motivo los cuatros hijos de Antonia estudian en una humilde escuela de su comunidad. 

Ella es maestra en su comunidad y está ejerciendo este trabajo  desde hace 12 años, le gusta esta profesión ya que ella a través de sus conocimientos y habilidades,  ayuda a contribuir al desarrollo de su comunidad y además  de ello le permita obtener un salario para poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de su casa. 

Antonia  es una mujer, con deseos de superación y prosperidad para sus hijos, razón por la cual ella necesita de un préstamo para poder comprar un terreno, en donde pueda construir un hogar para sus hijos, y seguir trabajando con perseverancia para poder pagar el préstamo.
El sueño de Antonia es tener una casa digna en donde  sus hijos puedan  vivir, ya que con tener un hogar  esto  les motivara a sus  hijos  a seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Antonia, 41, is a positive person every day. She is married and lives with her four children in Nahuala Solola. She always thinks about her children’s success and this is why her four children go to school at a humble school in the community.

She is a teacher in the community and has been doing this work for 12 years. She likes the profession because her knowledge and abilities help contribute to the community’s development. It also allows her to earn a salary to cover her home’s basic needs.

Antonia is a woman who wants her children to succeed and prosper. For this reason, she needs a loan to buy land where she can build a house for her children and keep working with perseverance to pay off the loan.

Antonia’s dream is to have a respectable house where her children can live, because having a home will motivate them to keep studying.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is a farmer with 15 years of experience working in the agricultural field. She lives in Shaqe village of Syuniq region with her husband and 17-year-old daughter. Her entire family is involved in agriculture.
 
Anna’s farm includes two cows and two calves, cultivation of wheat, emmer wheat, and potato, and nut, apple and pear trees. To be able to sustain her livestock during the winter season and purchase forage for feeding them, Anna has applied for this loan. The requested amount of 1,300 USD will be a huge support for this hard-working woman to purchase forage for the livestock.
 
Anna relies on lenders’ trust and support. This is Anna’s first loan, and it has been approved within the framework of the joint initiative by Kiva and SEF. This first-chance loan program provides loans to people who have not had access to credit products because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to purchase forage for livestock

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es: María de 54 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 3 hijos de 26, 20 y 16 años de edad. Ella es una mujer admirable que se gana la vida vendiendo prendas de vestir como: pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, camisetas, ropa interior, etc., actividad que realiza desde hace 24 años por lo que gracias a su experiencia y amabilidad cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos. María desea construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda ya que cuando llega de vender sus productos se siente muy cansada y desea tener un lugar agradable donde llegar a descansar, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda.
texts.en:
María, age 54, lives in her own home, together with her three children, ages 16, 20, and 26.  She is an admirable woman who earns her living selling outfits such as pants, tops, blouses, skirts, t-shirts, underwear, etc.  She has done this for 24 years.  Thanks to her experience and kindness, she has a big clientele who seek out her products.  

María wants to build a bedroom in her home because when she comes in from selling her products she is very tired and she wants to have a nice place where she can go to rest.  So, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and rebar in order to build a bedroom in her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and rebar in order to build a bedroom in her home.

loans.name: Borey

texts.en: Borey is a twenty-four-year-old student from Takeo province in Cambodia. He studies information technology and is in his fourth year at university in a city. He has also worked in a company since 2013, earning around USD 6.26 each day. His father is a motorcycle taxi driver and his mother buys chickens to resell at a market. Borey is short of finances to pay his fourth-year university fees, so he has decided to get a loan. This loan will help him earn a bachelor’s degree successfully. His plan after graduation is to find another better job so he will be able to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to pay his fourth-year university fees

loans.name: Griselda Esmeralda

texts.es: Griselda tiene 26 años de edad y se con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Además, de su tienda también se dedica a la venta de ropa y plásticos. Ella es una mejer emprendedora quien con muchas deseos de salir adelante ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio de ropa y de tienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará productos como: cereales, lácteos, verduras, golosinas, detergente y variedad de prendas de vestir. Espera poder mejorar sus ventas e ingresos y así poder apoyar más en la economía del hogar.
texts.en: Griselda is 28 years old and through much effort has managed to establish a small store in her house which is her main source of income. Besides her  tore she also works selling clothing and plastics. She is an enterprising woman who with a lot of desire to get ahead took the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in her store and her clothing business. With the amount requested she will buy products like cereal, dairy products, vegetables, sweets, detergent, and a variety of clothing. She hopes to be able to improve her sales and income and be able to support her household economy more.

loans.use: to buy cereals, dairy products, vegetables, sweets, detergent and a variety of clothing for sale.

loans.name: Maria Mybel

texts.en:
Maria Mybel finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities. Not only that she is doing her hobby, she earns an income as well. At the age of 42 and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-fledged member of PMPC. She credits to the cooperative her capital in supporting her gardening activities. 

Recently, Maria Mybel applied for a loan to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers. In the future, she wishes to become a supplier of flowers in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers

loans.name: Elena Elizabeth

texts.es: Elena de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz y maicillo desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de pagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: Elena is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her mother, her husband and her two children. She has been working growing corn and sorghum for a number of years. She sells her product in the various markets. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control, herbicides and to improve the land that is shown in the photo so she can continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control, herbicides and improve the land.

loans.name: Nilo

texts.en:
Nilo, married, is from Sindangan, Philippines. He is 46 years old and has five children. Nilo is managing his fishing activities; he owns a fishing boat where he hired five fishermen to work for him. He personally sells the catch from his fishing boat in nearby municipalities. Since he became a member of Paglaum MPC, he has been a member in good standing for almost three years. 

Nilo wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to Php 35,000 for the purchase of new nets, foam and other fishing accessories. As much as possible, he has to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize chances of a low or zero catch. He already has floaters to help guard his fish cages. He also wants to buy the fish catch of his neighbors so he can sell more fish at the nearby fish market, where he will fetch higher prices. 

In the future, he dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from the daily sales. He wishes to see his children finish their college education and have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets, foam and other fishing accessories

loans.name: Agar

texts.en:
Agar is 56 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is single with no dependents. 

Agar earns income from her little sari-sari store. She’s been engaged in this business for three years already. She earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of business activity and that amount is very helpful to support her basic needs. 

Agar has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stocks of groceries and other consumable goods for retail. She has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Agar hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries and other consumable goods

loans.name: İslim

texts.en:
İslim is married and has three children. 

She used to run a restaurant with her husband but it went out of business. To avoid being idle and contribute to her family, İslim began making stuffed meat pastries at home and distributing them to stores to make money. She also takes orders and sells to households. 

With the loan she’ll buy a deep freeze and ingredients.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
İslim Hanım evli üç çocuk annesi.  Daha önceleri eşiyle lokanta işleten İslim Hanım işleri bozulunca lokanta dükkanını kapatıyorlar.  Evde boş durmamak ve aile geçimine katkı sağlamak için evde içli köfte yapıp dükkanlara vererek  gelir elde ediyor.  Ayrıca sipariş alarak evlere de satış yapıyor.  Aldığı kredi ile derin dondurucu ve malzeme alacak.

loans.use: to buy a deep freeze and ingredients.

loans.name: Hüsniye

texts.en:
Hüsniye is married and has three children. 

She opened a small shop in her neighborhood after retiring from her job at a cleaning company. Her husband helps her. 

She’ll use the loan to buy products to sell. She likes her work very much and says she gets to chat with the customers while selling.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Hüsniye hanım evli üç çocuk annesi.  Temizlik şirketinden emekli olduktan sonra mahallesinde küçük bir bakkal dükkanı açmış.  Eşi de kendisine yardım ediyor.  Aldığı kredi ile dükkanına mal alacak.  İşinden çok memnun dükkanda bir çok kişi ile konuşarak hem satış yapıyor hem de sohbet ettiğini söylüyor.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop.

loans.name: Sofia Magdalena

texts.es:
Sofia es una joven mujer de 21 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la venta de comida rápida.
Ella es dulce, sensible, cariñosa, sincera, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona de ‘Chasquipampa’ la cual antiguamente era sitio de pastoreo de ganado y casas construidas de adobe, actualmente se encuentra totalmente urbanizado, de clima templado en verano y muy frio en invierno.
Sofía es de tez morena, cabello negro largo amarrado, ojos obscuros, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus padres y abuelos, viven en una casa propia perteneciente a sus abuelos, construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de comida rápida como; hamburguesas, salchipapas (salchichas y papa fritas), sándwiches de carne y de pollo y otros, en un puesto de venta fijo. Debido al paso del tiempo, las constantes lluvias y la humedad, las paredes y techo se han deteriorado causando grietas y rajaduras en el techo y paredes de su kiosco. Esto causa mal aspecto y pérdidas de ventas. “mis clientes más fieles son los alumnos de la policía porque la escuela de policías se encuentra cerca…” comenta. Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y la calidad de atención. Ella desea refaccionar su kiosco realizando la compra de pintura y otros, para arreglar el techo y las paredes. Este es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año y medio que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Sofía solicita un préstamo para refaccionar su puesto de venta y mejorar la atención hacia sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sofia is a young woman, age 21.  She is single, with no children.  Her business is selling quick meals.  She is sweet, sensitive, caring, sincere, understanding, responsible, and hardworking.  She carries out her business in the Chasquipampa district.  Years ago, this area had adobe houses and was where the cattle was grazed but these days it is completely urbanized.  It has mild weather in summer and is very cold in winter.

Sofía has tanned skin and dark eyes, with long, black, tied-back hair.  Her native language is Aymará, and she speaks Spanish in the community and while working.  She shares her life with her parents and grandparents.  They live in a house belonging to her grandparents.  It is built from brick, with running water, electricity, and sewage.  

Her business is selling quick meals from a permanent stand.  She sells meals such as hamburgers, “salchipapas" (hot dogs with potatoes), and sandwiches made with meat, chicken, or other filling.  Due to the passage of time, the constant rain, and the humidity, the walls and roof have deteriorated, causing cracks and breaks in the roof and walls of her kiosk.  This gives a bad impression, and loses sales.  She says, “My most faithful customers are the police students, because the police academy is nearby….”  Her dream is to improve her business and her quality of service.  She wants to repair her kiosk by buying paint and other items, in order to fix the roof and walls.  In a year and a half of running her business, this is her first loan sequence with the institution.

It is for these reasons that Sofía is asking for a loan to fix her sales stand and improve her customer service.

loans.use: to repair her sales stand and improve customer service

loans.name: Mary Ethel

texts.es:
Mary, es madre soltera, vive junto a su familia, ella cuida también de su madre, con la edad de 16 años aprendió a elaborar pan, pastelitos y paletas de sabores, ya con experiencia decidió emprender su propio negocio, también práctica la crianza de gallinas, no tiene un horario establecido, sus clientes adquieren sus productos mediante encargos.
El préstamo le será de ayuda para comprar harina, manteca, aceite, gas propano, azúcar y gallinas, pues necesita tener materia prima para cumplir con sus pedidos de temporada, está buscando tener ingresos mayores para resarcir su deuda y salir adelante con su familia.
Mary aspira a tener con vida su negocio y generar ingresos que sean de utilidad para los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Mary is a single mother, lives with her family, and also cares for her mother. At the age of 16, she learned how to make bread, pastries and flavored sweets. With this experience, she decided to undertake her own business. She also raises chickens. She doesn't have a set work schedule. Her customers get their products to order. 

The loan will be helpful to purchase flour, butter, oil, propane gas, sugar, and chickens, since she needs the raw materials to fill her orders this season. She is looking to have more income to pay off her debt and get ahead with her family. 

Mary aspires to have her business live and generate income that will be useful for the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase flour, butter, oil, propane gas, sugar, and chickens, since she needs to have raw materials to fill her orders this season.

loans.name: Nancy Delcarmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 33 años de edad, es madre soltera de sus 2 hijos que tienen 7 y 8 años y asisten a la escuela, Carmen se dedica a trabajar al jornal de trabajo de agricultura y también a la crianza de animales menores, el crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de terneros que los cuida y para al momento de venderlos obtener una ganancia, Carmen da gracias a quien hace posible su crédito para seguir trabajando y para el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en: Carmen is 33 years old, a single mother with two children ages 7 and 8 who go to school. Carmen works as a day laborer in agriculture and also raises small animals. The loan will be invested in the purchase of calves that she cares for and gets a profit when she sells them. Carmen thanks those who make her loan possible to continue working and for her children's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Aksanti Group

texts.en: Aksanti is a group of five women from Wezesha Project, in Eastern of Democratic Republic of Congo. One of Aksanti's group members, Venacia, age 58, is married and a mother of 8 children. She deals in the business of selling fish that she imports from Burundi. Venacia is borrowing $250 to purchase more fish for sale and it will help her increase her business size allowing her to improve her sales and profits. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to purchase her own house. However, directly through this loan that she will invest in her business, she is planning to support her family and give her children a better life including education and better nutrition.

loans.use: To purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home to improvement of access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Carla Yessenia

texts.es: Carla  tiene 21 años de edad, esta casada y su esposo trabaja de chofer, Carla tiene un hijo que tiene un mes de nacido, esta joven se dedica  desde hace 2 años atrás a la venta de ropa, es asi como le ayuda a su esposo con los gastos de hogar, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería en ropa y asi lograr mejorar sus ventas y a futuro le gustaría comprarse un cuartito para ponerse su local propio y ya no andar de ambulante.
texts.en:
Carla, 21, is married and has a one-month-old child, and her husband works as a driver.  She has worked selling clothing for two years to help her husband with the household expenses.

She's going to invest the loan in clothing merchandise so she can improve her sales.

Carla would like to buy herself a little room in the future to set up her own retail space and not have to sell as a street vendor.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Diógenes Marvin

texts.es: Marvin es un señor preocupado por mejorar las condiciones de su familia, es casado, con 3 hijos a su cargo a los que apoya en su desarrollo académico, actualmente tiene la necesidad de, Mejorar el cuarto de su vivienda, atravez del apoyo de un financiamiento, por el cual visito a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado y lograr realizar la obra que tanto necesita y el que utilizaría en la Compra de perlin y zinc, y de esa manera tener mejores condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en: Marvin is a man worried about improving his family's situation. He is married, with three children in his care, whom he supports in their academic development. At the moment, he has the need to improve a room in his house, through the support of a loan, for which he visited Ceprodel to be given one and manage to do the work that he needs so much. He will use it to purchase beams and metal sheeting, and in this way have better conditions and level of living.

loans.use: to purchase beams and metal sheeting.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar, 33, lives with his wife and three sons in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. 

Edgar has no higher education and he worked at various construction companies in the past. Now his main occupation is farming, He is a skilled farmer. On his farm he has two cows, a calf, two pigs and eight sheep. He says that his sons, except the smallest, greatly help him, especially in agricultural work. On his plot of land he cultivates potatoes and selling them brings good income for his family. 

He says he is happy with his big family and farming activities, but he says he will be the happiest if Kiva lenders help his wife to solve her health problem.

This loan in an amount of 440,000 Armenian drams will be of great use for Edgar’s wife in order to have a medical examination and find out the cause of her weakness and pains that she feels daily.

loans.use: to pay for a medical examination for his wife, to determine the cause of her weakness and pain.

loans.name: Nawaf

texts.en:
Nawaf is a 26-year-old married man, living with his family in a very small house in Sana'a city, Yemen.  

He is the sole breadwinner of the family with an income that is not enough. His house lacks of a lot of home appliances and most of what he has is very old. Nawaf works hard to provide his house with primary needs but his income is not enough to do it. 

Nawaf applied for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase some of the necessary home appliances for his house.

Nawaf hopes to buy a bus to work on it as a driver to provide his family with a better future.

loans.use: To purchase some of the necessary home appliances for his house.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: José de 39 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Él se desempeña como vendedor de refrescos envasados actividad que realiza desde hace 12 años y los distribuye en las tiendas de los diferentes cantones y colonias cercanas a su domicilio. José desea reparar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado y ha presentado filtraciones, además desea realizar esta mejora lo antes posible para aprovechar la época seca, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y de esta manera brindar una mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
José, age 39, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children.  He works selling packaged soft drinks.  He has been engaged in this business activity for 12 years.  He distributes to the stores in the different cantons and neighborhoods close to his house.

José wishes to repair the roof of his house.  It is damaged, and there have been leaks.  He also wishes to make this improvement as soon as possible in order to take advantage of the dry season.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails in order to change the roof of his house.  This way he will provide his family with greater comfort.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails in order to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es: José de 55 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su hermana. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida con su negocio de compra y venta de ganado actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años y que le ha permitido salir adelante. José desea colocar ladrillo de piso en su vivienda y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena y grava para colocar ladrillo de piso en su vivienda lo antes posible y así aprovechar la época seca para hacer la mejora y evitar cualquier inconveniente en época lluviosa.
texts.en:
José, 55, lives in his own home with his sister. He’s a hard-working man who earns a living from his business buying and selling cattle, an activity he has done for six years and has allowed him to move forward.

José wants to put in a brick floor in his home, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in brick flooring, sand, and gravel so he can install the floor as soon as possible in order to take advantage of the dry season to improve it and avoid the inconvenience of the wet season.

loans.use: to invest in brick flooring, sand, and gravel to put in a brick floor in his home.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, es casada, comparte su vivienda con su esposo y dos hijos, los cuales son totalmente dependientes, ella se dedica a comercializar pan duce, lo hace de una a cuatro de la tarde, ejerciendo está actividad tiene más de 10 años.
El préstamo será de utilidad para comprar variedad de pan dulce, con ello seguirá trabajando y abasteciendo su negocio cada vez que sea necesario, la inversión la realiza esperando obtener mejores ganancias para seguir apoyando a su esposo y cumplir con el pago de la deuda adquirida.
Su visión es seguir trabajando hasta lograr estabilizase económicamente y brindar un mejor futuro a   su familia.
texts.en:
María is married and shares her home with her husband and two children, who are totally dependent. She works selling sweet bread and does it at four in the afternoon, having done this work for over 10 years. 

The loan will be used to purchase a variety of sweet bread; with it she will continue working and stocking her business each time it's necessary. She makes the investment hoping to get more income to continue supporting her husband and make the payments on her acquired debt.

Her vision is to continue working until she is able to stabilize herself economically and offer a better future to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of sweet breads, with which she will continue working and stock her business each time it is necessary.

loans.name: Claudia Arely

texts.es:
Claudia, cuenta hoy en día con un negocio más sólido en el que sigue ofreciendo pupusas, comida, bebidas embazadas y refrescos, este progreso es atribuido a la buena administración del préstamo anterior. Su familia se encuentra muy bien y le brindan apoyo para continuar adelante.
Nuevamente solicita un  crédito para comprar harina, maíz, frijoles, arroz, carnes, quesillo, bebidas, verduras, etc., para seguir produciendo pupusas y comida, espera tener buenos resultados como con el crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Claudia has, these days, a more solid business where she continues selling pupusas, meals, bottled drinks and soft drinks. This progress is attributed to good management of the previous loan. Her family is doing very well and they help her to continue onward. 

Again, she asks for a loan to purchase flour, corn, beans, rice, meats, quesillo [farmer's cheese], drinks, vegetables, etc. to continue making pupusas and meals. She hopes to have good results like with the previous loan.

loans.use: to purchase flour, corn, beans, rice, meats, quesillo [farmer's cheese], drinks, vegetables, etc. to continue making pupusas and meals.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en:
Abraham is 63 years old and he lives with his wife in Vanadzor city of Lori region. 

Abraham for many years worked at the factory as a locksmith, but now in the village Shahumyan he runs a farm. At his farm he has four cows, five heifers and six piglets. His lovely wife greatly helps him in farming. Abraham’s wife makes very testy cheese and with this cheese she sells their farm’s milk and meat. 

The small income from their farm barely covers their needs. This is the reason that the stored hay for winter turned to be not enough till the spring. 

Abraham asks this loan in an amount of 400,000 Armenian drams since he must buy a lot of hay, as much as is needed till the end of the winter.

loans.use: to buy enough hay to last until the end of the winter.

loans.name: Dúo Nueva Peronia Group

texts.es:
Dúo Nueva Peronia
EL cual esta integrado por la señora Margarita  quien es propietaria de un taller de costuras ubicado en peronia el cual ya tiene mas de 20 años de tenerlo y en el cual le ha ido muy bien pues no solo ha logrado aclientarse en colegios si no que también con personas ajenas dentro y fuera de la colonia para la elaboración de uniformes  a pesar de que ya solo tiene una hija a su cargo ella siempre contribuye y ayuda para que sus hijas puedan tener el apoyo en económico y moral de ella y es por eso que ella toca nuevamente las puertas de fape para la adquisición de un nuevo crédito para la inversión de telas e hilos en toda variedad esperando que le tome en cuenta dicha solicitud.
texts.en: The "Duo Nueva Peronia" group. One of the members is Margarita who is the owner of a sewing shop located in Peronia. She has had it for more than 20 years and things have been going well. She has been able to make clients not only in the schools but also with other people both inside and outside her community to make uniforms. In spite of the fact that she now only has one daughter under her care, she has always contributed and helped her daughters have economic and moral support from her. For this reason she is knocking once again at the doors of FAPE to acquire a new loan to invest in fabric and threads of all varieties hoping that her request is noticed.

loans.use: to buy fabric for dressmaking. (clothing)

loans.name: Gulshaiym

texts.ru: Гулшайым 46 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей, младший сын живет с матерью, старший на заработках. С 1995 года Гулшайым занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодня в хозяйстве имеет: 5 коров, 20 овец. На участке мерою 0,52 Га она выращивает картофель и кукурузу для реализации. Доход Гулшайым небольшой, всего 10,000 сом- 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов овец и заготовку корма для скота. В будущем Гулшайым хочет увеличивать поголовье скота и накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Gulshaiym is 46 and widowed with two children. Her youngest son lives with her and her oldest is working abroad. Since 1995, she has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture. She currently has five cows and 20 sheep on her farm as well as 0.52 hectares of land where she grows potatoes and corn for sale. 

Gulshaiym's income is small, just 10,000 to 15,000 KGS per month, which isn't sufficient for living expenses. Therefore she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase additional sheep and animal feed. In the future she wants to increase her number of livestock even more and save toward home renovations.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and animal feed in order to develop her business and increase her income

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар 56 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Дилбар средне-специальное образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 24 года назад. Благодаря упорному труду Дилбар, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 коров, 30 овец, есть трактор. На участке мерою 0,56 ГА она выращивает картофель для реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Дилбар обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку корма для скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, что позволит накопить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en:
Dilbar is 56 and married with four children. She has a specialist high school education and works in animal husbandry and agriculture as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 24 years ago. Thanks to her hard work, she now has five cows, 30 sheep and a tractor on her farm, as well as 0.56 hectares of land where she grows potatoes for sale. Her total monthly income is about 20,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Dilbar has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 20,000 KGS to purchase animal feed. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing her number of livestock, which will allow her to save toward her son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her livestock

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is a thirty-seven-year-old married woman with nine children from Mayorga, Leyte. Her oldest child is sixteen and the youngest is one. She is engaged in a hog raising business. She raises and sells hogs to support the needs of her family. Her husband earns a living by working as a conductor, collecting fares from public utility vehicles. 

She has requested a loan to buy pig feed. These funds will contribute to the  improvement and rapid growth of her hogs. Thus, Jenifer will be selling healthy hogs in a few months to come. Slowly, she will earn more and this will help her continue to send her children to school.

Jenifer dreams of expanding her business in hog raising to make it more productive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy pig feed

loans.name: Gulzhan

texts.ru: Гулжан 29 лет, замужем, есть двухгодовалая дочь. Образование у Гулжан средне-специальное, работает учителем младших классов. На протяжении 4 лет она занимается животноводством, начав с покупки скота на 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулжан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулжан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически-чистого, вкусного молока. Доходы от кредита Гулжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Gulzhan is 29 and married with a two-year-old daughter. She has a specialist high school education and works as a primary school teacher. For the past four years she has also been working in animal husbandry, a business she began with the purchase of livestock for 25,000 KGS. Thanks to her hard work, she now has two cows and 10 sheep on her farm with a monthly income of 15,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Gulzhan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase a dairy cow to increase the amount of flavourful organic milk she can sell. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing her number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow in order to increase the volume of organic milk she can sell

loans.name: Sharookan Group

texts.en:
Sharookan previously applied for its first group loan from Kiva. This group consists of four women who are Mabroka, Saeeda, Jamila, and Hussena. They have completely repaid their first loan and applied for a second loan of 120,000 YER from Kiva Lenders.

Within this group, Mabroka took out her first loan from Kiva lenders to purchase cosmetics, incense and perfumes to resell to her customers. The Kiva loan helped her attract a lot of customers. She is very thankful for Kiva lenders for this first loan. Now, she wants to enlarge her business more to be able to earn enough money to cover her family's expenses. She applied for a second loan of 40,000 YER from Kiva lenders to purchase more perfumes and incense to resell. Mabroka hopes this loan well be funded well.

loans.use: To purchase more perfumes and incense for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and water closet

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es: María tiene 58 años de edad y desde hace mucho tiempo se gana la vida gracias a su negocio de venta de variedad de prendas de vestir. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingreso y es el que le permite  cubrir los gastos necesarios de su hogar y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir como: blusas, calcetines, ropa interior para dama, etc. de esta forma espera mejorar sus ingresos y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: María is 58 years old and for a very long time, she has earned her living thanks to her business selling a variety of clothing. This business is her primary source of income and it is what allows her to pay the necessary expenses of her home and, together with her husband, they maintain the household economy. With the desire to increase her sales and income, she has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase a larger quantity of clothing such as blouses, socks, ladies' lingerie, etc. and, in this way, she hopes to increase her income and give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, socks, ladies' lingerie, etc. for sale.

loans.name: Jose Gustavo

texts.es: Jose es un señor de 54 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos un hijo de 17 años de edad y una hija de 14 años y los 2 se encuentran estudiando, Jose se dedica desde hace 20 años atrás a dar masajes para dolores en el cuerpo, fregados para torceduras,  estudios para enfermedades de columna entre otros, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de fajas, bandas elásticas,  férulas y mas para seguir trabajando en su negocio y ayudar a sus clientes y demás personas que lo necesiten o tengan algún dolor relacionado a lo que el se dedica
texts.en: José is a 54-year-old man, he has 2 children, a son who is 17 and a daughter who is 14 and the two of them are students. José has worked for the past 20 years giving massages for body pain, washes for sprains, and studies for back problems, among others.The loan will be invested in the purchase of support belts, elastic bans, splints and more to be able to continue working in his business and helping his clients and other people who need it and have some pain related to what work he does.

loans.use: to purchase support belts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand and pay for labor to plaster the walls of her house.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 24 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 9 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando con el apoyo de Ángela. Ella se desempeña como jornalera en una finca cercana, pero además presta sus servicios domésticos buscando obtener mejores ingresos económicos. Ángela desea instalar energía eléctrica ya que actualmente no cuenta con este servicio, y desea brindarle a su familia este beneficio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: alambre eléctrico, caja térmica, toma corriente y pagar mano de obra para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Angela is 24 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and her 9-year-old son. Her son is enrolled in school thanks to Angela's support. She makes a living as a day laborer on a nearby farm and supplements her income as a domestic worker. Angela would like to install electricity in her house. She currently does not have this service and would like to provide it for her family. Thus, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase electric wire, a cool box, and an electrical outlet, and to pay for the labor needed to install electricity in her house.

loans.use: to purchase electric wire, a cool box, and an electrical outlet, and to pay for the labor needed to install electricity in her house.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
Carlos Manuel, es un hombre muy responsable, casado de 37 años de edad y vive en Suchitepéquez, es un hombre joven ya que tiene una familia de tan solo dos hijos, uno que estudia en segundo primaria en la escuela de su comunidad y la otra por ser pequeña aun no va a la escuela. 

Manuel es un hombre que le gusta trabajar para sacar adelante a su familia, pues desde  hace varios  años, él trabajo como supervisor de una empresa en Suchitepéquez, pues la meta de don Carlos, es seguir trabajando con esfuerzo y dedicación para darle un mejor fututo a sus hijos.
Carlos es un hombre que ama mucho a su familia, pues uno de los sueños de este señor, es que pueda conseguir un préstamo, para poder comprar un terreno, y darle a cada uno de sus hijos como una herencia para que en  el futuro ellos tengan un espacio donde construir su propia casa. Carlos tiene la esperanza de conseguir su  préstamo.
texts.en:
Carlos Manuel at age 37 is a responsible, married man, with two children. One child is in the second grade of primary school, and the second one is still too young to attend school.

Carlos is a supervisor at a company in Suchitepéquez, where he lives. He's been doing this work for several years. He loves his family and enjoys working to provide for them. His goal is to carry on with effort and dedication so he can offer his children a better future.

One of his dreams is to obtain a loan to buy land that will be left to each child as inheritance, so that in the future they will have a place of their own to build their homes. Carlos is hopeful that he'll get this loan.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Sergio Danilo

texts.es: A sus 25 años de edad Danilo es un joven soltero que vive con sus padres  y en ocasiones vive   solo cuando le contratan para trabajar lejos de su familia, el se dedica a  trabajar de albañil y también a la crianza de animales menores, el crédito lo va a invertir en compra de chanchos  y comenta que es su madre quien le da cuidando sus chanchos y que la ganancia que le queda al momento de venderlos le deja a su madre para que se apoye en los gastos del hogar, Danilo espera mejorar su negocio y seguir apoyando a su madre.
texts.en: At 25 years old Danilo is young and single and lives with his parents. At times he lives on his own when he contracts work that is far from his family. He works as a bricklayer and also raises small animals. He will invest the loan in buying pigs. He comments that it was his mother who takes care of the pigs and he leaves the profit when they sell to his mother so that they support the household expenses. Danilo wants to improve his business and continue to support his mother.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно 50 лет. Она повар и занимается приготовлением и продажей национального мясного блюда "Манту". Этой деятельностью она занимается в течение 3 лет. Ее муж охранник, а сын работает в автомастерской. Раъно живет в Б.Гафуровском районе города Худжанд с мужем, сыном, невесткой и внуками. В настоящий момент в их доме проводятся ремонтные работы для улучшения жилищных условий. На сумму кредита Раъно хочет купить стройматериалы, так как собственных средств не хватает для этой цели. Раъно очень хочет завершить ремонт до праздника и встретить Новый год в доме с хорошими жилищными условиями. Это возможно только с вашей поддержкой, на которую Раъно очень надеется.
texts.en: Ra'no is 50 years old. She is a chef who cooks and sells the Central Asian meat dish "Manti" (large, meat-filled dumplings eaten with one's hands). She has been in this business for the last three years. Her husband is a security guard and her son works in an auto mechanic's shop. Ra'no lives in the B. Gafurov District in the city of Khujand with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. Currently, repairs are being made on their home to improve their living conditions. With the lent amount, Ra'no wants to buy construction materials, as their personal savings are not enough to cover the expenses. Ra'no really wants to complete the repair work before the New Year's holiday and greet the New Year in a house with great living conditions. This is possible only with your support, on which Ra'no greatly relies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish repairing her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beauty products for use in his barber shop.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en: When she joined PMPC, Elsie arrived at the right place to get access to the capital she needed. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet when went broke after her first business went bad. To Elsie, PMPC came to the rescue by lending her money when she needed it most. Now, she has applied for another loan for the next cropping season. She plans to use this amount for land and seedbed preparation.  Elsie perseveres and always believe she can reach her goal of continuously providing for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and land preparation

loans.name: Melinde

texts.en: Melinde has a collection of ornamental garden plants. She finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities and earning money to support her family. As a Microfinance member of PMPC, she has sought financial help to purchase a variety of ornamental plants that she can grow and sell. In the future, Melinde wishes to become the supplier of flowers to neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase variety of ornamental plants

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina de 37 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo ya que por las lluvias se ha deteriorado muchos, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que ella y sus hijos puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en: Reina, 37 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her three children. She has worked selling clothing for some years. She wants to improve her house, replacing the roof since, because of the rain, it has deteriorated a lot, but with what she earns, she doesn't have enough. For this reason, she is asking for a loan to purchase metal sheeting, beams and pay labor costs so that she and her children can live more securely.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, beams, and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Hamad Group

texts.en:
Hamad is a group which consists of four women who live in Sana'a city, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 160,000 YER from AMB.

Asma is the leader of the group. She is a 25-year-old married woman with only one child, living with her family in a very poor house, which lacks of a lot of home appliances.
